title: Frontend Engineer - India (YC S23)Frontend Engineer - India (YC S23)
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Frontend Engineer (India)As a Frontend Engineer, you will have the unique opportunity to shape the DNA of our user experience. Given the no/low-code nature of our platform, we're seeking someone who is not only technically adept but also deeply passionate about creating an engaging, intuitive, and performant user interface.Responsibilities:      Work directly with the founders to conceptualize and implement an exceptional user interface.Lead frontend architecture decisions, ensuring the platform is scalable and maintainable.Drive forward web performance optimization.Advocate for and implement UI/UX best practices, ensuring users are at the heart of every design decision.Incorporate user feedback to continuously iterate and refine the platform.Stay updated with the latest frontend technologies and integrate them where relevant.Establish foundational frontend practices that will guide future team members.
Requirements:      Degree in a technical discipline, preferably computer science.Experience with React/NextJS or similar frontend frameworks.Experience with the entire web development process (design, development, and deployment).Ability to integrate seamlessly with backend APIs.Familiarity with source control tools, preferably Git.In-depth knowledge of responsive design.A keen eye for user experience and UI design.Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.Problem-solving aptitude and enthusiasm for overcoming challenges.
Nice to Have:      Experience in early-stage startup environments.Experience with no/low-code platforms.Understanding of web performance optimization and best practices.Familiarity with Python FastAPI or similar backend frameworks.

title: Javascript DeveloperJavascript Developer
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  This role is for one of the Weekday's clientsSalary range: Rs 400000 - Rs 600000 (ie INR 4-6 LPA)Min Experience: 0 yearsLocation: BangaloreJobType: full-timeWe are seeking highly motivated entry-level JavaScript Developers to join our Solutions team. In this role, you will work on real-world applications that power asset and inventory traceability for leading organizations. Your work will directly impact operational efficiency, and you'll get hands-on exposure to building scalable technology used across thousands of live deployments.This is a great opportunity for someone eager to learn, contribute, and grow rapidly within a fast-moving, high-impact environment. You will gain experience in IoT, system integration, and end-to-end solution delivery while improving your technical and problem-solving skills.RequirementsWhat You'll Do       Build and maintain web-based applications using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and SQL.  Collaborate with the solutions and engineering teams to deliver high-quality features and enhancements.  Support the development and customization of modules for real-time asset and inventory traceability.  Debug and resolve technical issues, ensuring stability and performance.  Participate in testing, deployment, and rollout across multiple client environments.  Continuously learn new tools, technologies, and best practices to improve system performance and user experience. 
Who We're Looking For       Self-driven, ambitious, and eager to learn with a passion for building technology.  Strong problem-solving mindset and ability to work in fast-paced environments.  Willingness to take ownership and grow quickly through hands-on experience. 
Required Skills       JavaScript  SQL  HTML5  CSS

title: Frontend DeveloperFrontend Developer
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Company Overview:GoodScore is on a mission to make financial literacy and credit access simple, actionable, and inclusive for over 150 million Indians who are credit-underserved.From starting personalized credit consulting in 2023 to now empowering over 1 million users to take control of their credit health, we are one of India‚Äôs fastest-growing credit score & credit management apps.We are backed by top VC funds in India, ranked among the top 10 finance apps in India, and are on the 1x to 100x journey. We‚Äôre building a team that shares our vision of transforming how India manages credit.Goodscore Raises Series ARole Description :This is a full-time role for a Frontend Developer at our Bengaluru office. As a Frontend Developer, you will be responsible for the day-to-day tasks of developing user-friendly interfaces, implementing designs, and ensuring the seamless integration of backend services. You will collaborate with the design and development teams to optimize the user experience and ensure high-quality code.Qualifications :- B.Tech in Computer Science or related field.- Candidates with 2-6 years of experience- Front-End Development, Responsive Web Design, and Web Development skills- Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript- Experience with JavaScript frameworks like React JS- Experience with React Native is an added advantage- Familiarity with version control systems like Git- Experience in building responsive and mobile-friendly applications- Understanding of web performance optimization techniques- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment

title: Reactjs DeveloperReactjs Developer
companyDescription: AI-Driven Solutions, Custom Software Development, Global Talent Optimization | Gen AI, Cloud, Cybersecurity & Automation
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Industry & SectorA remote-first company in the IT services and SaaS product engineering sector building customer-facing web applications and internal tools. We deliver high-quality, scalable single-page applications (SPAs) and developer-friendly front-end platforms for global clients.Primary Title: React DeveloperLocation: Remote (India), But occasional trips to Pune.Role & Responsibilities      Design, develop, and maintain responsive React-based single-page applications using modern React patterns (functional components and hooks).Translate UI/UX designs into reusable, accessible, and unit-tested components while ensuring pixel-perfect implementation across devices.Integrate front-end components with RESTful APIs and collaborate with backend engineers to define efficient data contracts and error handling.Optimize application performance, bundle size, and runtime behavior using code-splitting, lazy loading, and performance profiling tools.Write and maintain automated tests (unit and integration) and participate in code reviews to uphold code quality and best practices.Contribute to CI/CD pipelines, front-end build tooling, and documentation to streamline releases and developer onboarding.
Skills & QualificationsMust-Have      React.jsJavaScript (ES6+)TypeScriptReduxHTML5CSS3REST APIsGit
Preferred      Next.jsGraphQLJest / React Testing Library
Additional Qualifications      Proven experience working in remote, distributed teams and delivering production web applications.Public portfolio or GitHub demonstrating component-based architecture and test coverage.Strong English communication for async collaboration and sprint ceremonies.
Benefits & Culture Highlights      Fully remote, India-based hiring with flexible working hours.Fast-moving product development environment with ownership and learning opportunities.Mentorship, code review culture, and access to modern front-end tools and libraries.
We seek high-performing React developers who take pride in clean code, performance, and shipping delightful user experiences. Apply with your CV and a link to your portfolio or GitHub to be considered.Skills: frontend development,javascript,css3,redux,react.js,react,git,html5,typescript

title: Frontend Developer (SDE-1)Frontend Developer (SDE-1)
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Link to Apply is at the bottom of the JD. Please read the requirements carefully before applying.About LimeChatAtLimeChat , we‚Äôre on a mission to revolutionize conversational commerce by enabling human-level interactions on WhatsApp. Backed by top-tier investors such as Stellaris, Titan, Pi Ventures and part ofY Combinator W21 , we already power 500+ leading brands‚Äîincluding Mahindra, HUL, ITC, and Mamaearth.Our next frontier: enterprise verticals likeBFSI, Health, Auto, and Retail . We‚Äôre shipping cutting-edgeGenAI agents that automate and personalise millions of customer journeys every single day.Our founders areComputer Science alumni from IIT Delhi with a specialization in AI and have been recognized asForbes 30 Under 30honorees for their groundbreaking work. Their vision and leadership drive us to build the best products in the industry.We‚Äôre a tight-knit crew that moves fast, sweats the details, and owns outcomes. If that sounds like your vibe, you‚Äôll feel right at home.Some Quotes We Live By‚ÄúIt‚Äôs okay to fail. It‚Äôs not okay to not try.‚Äù‚ÄúDo the right thing when others are not looking.‚ÄùWhat are we looking for?We‚Äôre looking for aFrontend Engineer withResponsibilities2+ years of non-internship experience to help us build fast, reliable, and delightful interfaces for our GenAI products.You‚Äôll work closely with Product, Design, and Backend teams to turn complex conversational and analytics workflows into clean, usable experiences. You should be comfortable owning features end-to-end on the frontend, have strong fundamentals in JavaScript and the browser, and enjoy working in a fast-paced startup environment.If you like building things users touch every day, care about polish and performance, and want your work to ship quickly and often, this role will fit you well.ResponsibilitiesBuild core product interfaces:Develop and maintain high-quality, scalable, and reusable React components and pages for our web applications.Ship features end-to-end on the frontend:Take ownership of UI stories from spec ‚Üí implementation ‚Üí review ‚Üí rollout.Integrate with APIs:Work Closely With Backend Engineers To Consume REST/GraphQL APIs, Handle Edge Cases, And Keep The UI Resilient When Things Fail.Manage State CleanlyImplement and maintain predictable state management (e.g. Redux/other patterns) for complex flows and data-heavy views.Maintain performance & quality:Optimise bundle sizes, loading times, and rendering performance; fix layout, responsiveness, and browser issues.Write tests that matter:Use Jest and React Testing Library to cover critical components and flows, and keep regressions low.Collaborate with design:Work With Designers In Tools Like Figma To Translate Layouts Into Pixel-perfect, Responsive Implementations; Suggest UX Improvements When Needed.Uphold Frontend Best PracticesParticipate in code reviews, propose improvements to our frontend architecture, and help evolve our design system and UI patterns.Must-haves2+ years of hands-on experience in frontend engineering(excluding internships).Strong proficiency inJavaScript(ES6+), including DOM manipulation and core browser concepts.Solid experience withReact and modern React patterns (Hooks, functional components, composition).Good understanding ofHTML5 ,CSS3 , and layout techniques (Flexbox, Grid); ability to build responsive UIs.Experience with state management(Redux or similar) in production apps.Comfortable working withREST APIs and handling loading, error, and empty states gracefully.Experience with frontend tooling such as bundlers/build tools ( Vite , Webpack, etc.) and package managers ( npm , yarn ).Exposure to testing usingJest andReact Testing Library(or similar).Familiarity withGit and common workflows (branches, PRs, reviews).High ownership mindset, attention to detail, and comfort working in a fast-paced startup .Nice-to-haveExperience working with design systems or component libraries.Understanding of performance optimisation in React (memoisation, code-splitting, lazy loading, etc.).Familiarity withSASS Or Other CSS Preprocessors.Experience With Authentication Flows(OAuth, SSO) and providers likeAuth0 .Exposure to frontend CI/CD pipelines and deployment.Familiarity with error monitoring / analytics tools like LogRocket, Sentry, Mixpanel, or similar.Basic understanding of how the backend works (APIs, data models) and comfort reading API docs or using Postman.Tech Stack You‚Äôll Work WithReact      JavaScript (ES6+)TypeScript (nice-to-have)HTML/CSSReduxJestReact Testing LibraryVite/WebpackGitFigmaREST APIsGrowth PathYear 1:
Own key frontend modules, improve reliability and UX of existing flows, and contribute to our shared component library/design system.Year 2+:Grow intoSenior Frontend Engineer , own larger product surfaces, mentor junior devs, and influence frontend architecture and tooling across teams.Perks & BenefitsUnlimited PTO & sick leaveSubsidised fitness membershipFree lunch & snacksAnnual company retreatPet-friendly office üêæApply HereDoes this role sound like a good fit? Apply here and choose‚ÄúFrontend Engineer‚Äù(or the closest matching option) in the dropdown.

title:
Software Engineer - II Frontend Leaning (Full Stack) 
    
    

Software Engineer - II Frontend Leaning (Full Stack) with verification
companyDescription: The best-run businesses run on Rippling.
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  About RipplingRippling gives businesses one place to run HR, IT, and Finance. It brings together all of the workforce systems that are normally scattered across a company, like payroll, expenses, benefits, and computers. For the first time ever, you can manage and automate every part of the employee lifecycle in a single system.Take onboarding, for example. With Rippling, you can hire a new employee anywhere in the world and set up their payroll, corporate card, computer, benefits, and even third-party apps like Slack and Microsoft 365‚Äîall within 90 seconds.Based in San Francisco, CA,  Rippling has raised $1.85B+ from the world‚Äôs top investors‚Äîincluding Kleiner Perkins, Founders Fund, Sequoia, Greenoaks, and Bedrock‚Äîand was named one of America's best startup employers by Forbes.We prioritize candidate safety. Please be aware that all official communication will only be sent from @Rippling.com addresses.About the HRIS Product Team at Rippling: The HR Products organization is looking for a Software Engineer - 2 to join the team which owns one of the most critical and strategic product lines for Rippling - Global Contractors, Compliance & Work Authorization - which is among the most foundational products of Rippling. The areas of ownership for this role will require you to be a key owner of our Global Expansion efforts, which comes with high visibility and growth opportunities. This role will involve an outstanding blend of Technical savviness and Product development, the ability to look into and shape the overall architecture of the Product itself.As a Software Engineer - II, you will own/design/develop end-to-end features/modules in product development. You'll be influencing the product spec for an owned feature, designing the Frontend and wiring it with the backend to launch. Once launched, you'll be responsible for any further improvements to the feature.What you will do      Collaborate with Product Managers and other stakeholders within Engineering (Backend, UX, etc.) to maintain a high bar for quality in a fast-paced, iterative environment.Wear a product manager hat when needed.Build features that solve technical problems of high scope and complexity.Continuously ship incremental updates at a rapid paceParticipate in planning activities, perform code reviews, and contribute to a growing team.Participate in an on-call rotation to handle customer and production support
Who You Are:      You care about product ownership and solving problems for our customers.You‚Äôre passionate about being in a product-focused environment where everyone cares deeply about customer impact.You enjoy and are enthusiastic about writing code!
What you will need      3+ years of professional work experience using React and a backend system (i.e. Python/Django)Strong grasp of computer science fundamentals, providing you with a solid foundation to tackle complex technical problems and drive innovation.Outstanding capacity to convey intricate technical concepts clearly and precisely, both in written and verbal communication, while collaborating effectively across diverse functional teams.Ability to thrive in an ambiguous environment by identifying areas of impact and independently pursuing themInfectious passion for solving real customer pain points

title:
Software Engineer - React Developer 
    
    

Software Engineer - React Developer with verification
description:
About the job
            

            
                
                  Position DescriptionJob Title: React Developer Total Experience: 6‚Äì10 years in Front-End DevelopmentRelevant Experience in React: 4+ yearsLocation: Hyderabad / Pune / Mumbai / Bangalore / ChennaiJob SummaryWe are seeking a highly skilled React Developer with strong expertise in modern front-end technologies and proven experience in migrating legacy UI applications to React. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in designing scalable, maintainable, and high-performing user interfaces while modernizing existing systems. This role requires deep knowledge of React.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, and front-end architecture, along with the ability to collaborate across teams to deliver seamless user experiences.Key Responsibilities       Lead migration of legacy UI applications to React, ensuring performance, scalability, and maintainability. Design and develop reusable components, hooks, and state management solutions (Redux/Context API). Utilise AI code accelerators for faster migration. Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability. Integrate front-end components with RESTful APIs and backend services. Conduct code reviews, enforce best practices, and mentor junior developers. Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve UI/UX issues during migration and post-deployment. Document technical designs, migration strategies, and provide training/support to stakeholders.
Key Requirements       4 to 6 years of front-end development experience, with at least 4+ years in React.js. Strong expertise in React.js, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, SAAS, and modern front-end frameworks. Proven experience in migrating legacy UI frameworks (Silverlight, AngularJS, jQuery, JSP, etc.) to React. Hands-on experience with state management libraries (Redux, MobX, Context API). Familiarity with build tools and bundlers (Webpack, Babel, Vite). Strong understanding of responsive design, cross-browser compatibility, accessibility standards. Should have sound understanding of SEO concepts. Experience integrating with RESTful APIs and microservices. Excellent problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills. Basic understanding of backend tech (Node.js, Express).
Preferred Skills       Exposure to testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress). Experience with Next.js, server-side rendering (SSR), and static site generation (SSG). Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) for front-end deployments. Familiarity with performance monitoring tools (Lighthouse, New Relic). Strong collaboration skills and ability to work in agile environments.
Your future duties and responsibilitiesRequired Qualifications To Be Successful In This RoleTogether, as owners, let‚Äôs turn meaningful insights into action.Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you‚Äôll reach your full potential because‚Ä¶You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That‚Äôs why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company‚Äôs strategy and direction.Your work creates value. You‚Äôll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.You‚Äôll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You‚Äôll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.Come join our team‚Äîone of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.
